title: Homepage theme, responsive safety, animations, and finance-style photo/content sections

requirements.summary: Rework Home page theme to a higher-contrast finance/army-green palette with consistent typography, spacing, and CTA styling.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page sections have clearly differentiated background tones (e.g., alternating subtle tints) and readable text contrast on all cards/sections.
Primary/secondary CTA buttons have clear hover/focus states and remain readable on light and dark backgrounds.
No user-facing text is changed to non-English as part of this redesign (English only for new UI copy).

file_operations.description: Adjust global OKLCH theme variables and base typography defaults to increase contrast and reinforce a cohesive army-green/cream finance palette (backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, card tones). Ensure focus-ring visibility. (Uses styling system from initial-app; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

Extend Tailwind theme tokens (colors/shadows/animations) to support consistent finance-style section backgrounds, card elevation, and CTA states aligned with the updated palette. (Tailwind setup from initial-app/build-template-react; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

Apply updated palette and typography consistently across existing Home sections using composed shadcn-ui components (Button/Card/Badge/Separator) without editing frontend/src/components/ui; ensure CTAs have consistent hover/focus states across light/dark section backgrounds. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Eliminate responsive layout collisions/overlaps on Home by tightening spacing rules and breakpoints for hero overlay, transitions, and grids.
acceptanceCriteria: At widths 360px, 768px, 1024px, and 1440px, no text, buttons, or images overlap each other (including the hero CTA overlay and carousel).
All sections maintain adequate vertical spacing between headings, cards, and media; no clipped content occurs.
Sticky/mobile UI (if present) does not cover critical Home page content.

file_operations.description: Refactor the hero CTA overlay positioning so it never collides with carousel content/controls (use responsive positioning, container spacing, and safe-area padding); audit and adjust section paddings, transitions, and grid gaps at 360/768/1024/1440 widths; ensure newly added sections follow the same spacing rules. Uses composed shadcn-ui primitives; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Harden hero carousel layout to prevent overlay collisions at common breakpoints (height, content overlay spacing, control placement, and motion-reduce behavior) while keeping accessibility intact. Uses composed shadcn-ui Button; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Validate Home page bottom padding/safe-area handling so the StickyContactBar (mobile) cannot cover critical CTAs or new sections; adjust layout spacing hooks only (do not change bootstrap/auth hooks). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure mobile sticky bar height and safe-area inset handling are consistent so it does not obscure important Home content; coordinate with Home page padding utilities. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add/adjust utility classes to support safe-area padding and consistent section spacing helpers used by Home (no per-component inline hacks). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add lightweight modern finance-style animations (section transitions, hover micro-interactions, subtle accents) with full prefers-reduced-motion support.
acceptanceCriteria: Animations remain smooth and subtle (no large distracting motion) and are consistent across sections.
When the OS setting prefers-reduced-motion is enabled, auto-advancing and motion-heavy effects are disabled/reduced while content remains fully accessible.
Interactive elements (cards/buttons) show clear hover and focus feedback without layout shift.

file_operations.description: Add/standardize subtle finance-style keyframes/animations (e.g., gentle fade/slide, accent shimmer, non-jarring hover glow) for reuse across Home sections; keep durations/easings consistent and compatible with motion-reduce classes. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Tune reveal behavior to feel more modern/finance-like (subtle easing, distance, stagger support) while ensuring prefers-reduced-motion disables motion-heavy effects and content remains immediately visible. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Apply consistent animation classes to section containers/cards/CTAs (micro-interactions on hover/focus without layout shift) and add subtle animated accent elements where appropriate, using existing RevealOnScroll and motion-reduce utilities. Uses composed shadcn-ui components; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure hero slide text animations remain subtle and are reduced/disabled under prefers-reduced-motion; confirm auto-advance remains disabled when reduced motion is enabled. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add new Home sections: profit/savings example cards and at least one credibility section (testimonials/FAQs/stats) with responsive styling.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page includes a dedicated section that shows multiple (3+) example profit/savings scenarios in a clear card layout.
Home page includes at least one additional section chosen from testimonials, FAQs, or stats/metrics, with consistent styling and spacing.
All new sections are responsive and do not create overlap/collision issues.

file_operations.description: Create a Home-only section component that renders 3+ profit/savings scenarios in a consistent card grid using composed shadcn-ui Card/Badge/Button, SectionHeading, and RevealOnScroll; keep new UI copy in English. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create an additional credibility-oriented section component (choose one: testimonials, FAQs, or stats/metrics) styled consistently with the new theme; ensure keyboard/focus accessibility and responsive behavior; keep new UI copy in English. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire the new ProfitExamplesSection and CredibilitySection into the existing Home page flow in appropriate positions (finance marketing layout), ensuring alternating background tones and non-colliding responsive spacing. Uses composed shadcn-ui components; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add structured content entries for profit/savings examples and the selected credibility section (items, labels, figures, optional disclaimers), keeping new copy in English for newly introduced strings. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Integrate AI-generated, non-identifiable finance brand-ambassador imagery into Home sections with graceful fallback loading.
acceptanceCriteria: New AI-generated photo-style images are added as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and rendered on the Home page.
Images are clearly non-identifiable (no real celebrity likeness) and match the site’s color theme.
Images load via existing public asset URL handling and display a graceful fallback on error (using the existing image component pattern).

file_operations.description: Add generated static asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/celebrity-ambassador-1.dim_1200x1200.png (non-identifiable finance brand ambassador portrait).
Add generated static asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/celebrity-ambassador-2.dim_1200x1200.png (non-identifiable finance brand ambassador portrait).
Add generated static asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/celebrity-banner.dim_1920x800.png (wide banner with 2–3 non-identifiable ambassadors).

Create a Home section that displays the new ambassador banner + portraits using publicAssetUrl and ImageWithFallback for graceful error handling; ensure images integrate with the army-green theme and remain responsive. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire AmbassadorBannerSection into Home (e.g., near credibility/profit sections) and ensure layout doesn’t collide at common breakpoints; use ImageWithFallback pattern for all new images. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Make new Home sections content-driven by extending the centralized Home content module and consuming it from the page/components.
acceptanceCriteria: New Home page sections pull their titles/body/items from the existing content module pattern (e.g., frontend/src/content/faujiFinanceContent.ts).
No duplicated content constants are introduced in page components when a centralized content module is available.
The Home page renders successfully with the expanded content set.

file_operations.description: Introduce centralized, structured exports for the new Home sections (profit/savings examples, credibility content, ambassador section copy/labels), designed for easy future edits without duplicating constants across components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Consume profit/savings data exclusively from frontend/src/content/faujiFinanceContent.ts (no inline duplicated constants), rendering figures/cards consistently. Uses composed shadcn-ui components; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Consume credibility section data exclusively from frontend/src/content/faujiFinanceContent.ts and render it responsively with consistent styling and motion-reduce support. Uses composed shadcn-ui components; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Consume ambassador section labels/copy from frontend/src/content/faujiFinanceContent.ts while keeping image paths centralized and rendered via publicAssetUrl + ImageWithFallback. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Remove any duplicated inline content for the newly added sections and rely on frontend/src/content/faujiFinanceContent.ts as the single source for titles/items. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
